element.name: Therapeutic Hypothermia by EMS
element.definition: Documentation of EMS initiation of Therapeutic Hypothermia.
element.v3Comment: For states and local agencies that participate in the Cardiac Arrest Registry for Enhanced Survival (CARES), eArrest.10 is the equivalent of CARES data element #32: Was Hypothermia Care Provided in the Field as defined by CARES in the CARES Data Dictionary: https://mycares.net/sitepages/uploads/DataDictionary.
